how you manage to get from official site when its not up on there yet?
Pen drive = usb memory stick.

There is 2 ways to update it:

1. Burn it on a cd or dvd
2. Usb stick

JUST A WARNING:

Do not apply this update on a JTAG console as it will blow the efuses and remove your homebrew
I should put the *.rar or the files in the *.rar to the pendrive?
unpack it and put the $Systemupdate$ folder in root of the stick/cd/dvd

small guide

1. unpack it
2. Put the $Systemupdate$ folder in root of the stick/cd/dvd
3. insert stick/cd/dvd with the update
4. turn off xbox 360
5. turn on the xbox 360 again, and you will get a request asking if you want to update.

Confirmed working to unblock HDD support with both Game Saves & HDD Game Installs (DLC also confirmed working as long as the DLC was downloaded from live via the banned box before becoming banned - May work if re-signed as well however I have yet to re-sign any DLC as of yet to test)..

Aviator is working fine on my end - So I really do not see what others are having issues with..
(Note: I used a 20GB HDD that I swap with a non banned console - The updated profile may have something to do with the Aviator working on the banned console)

I sure am happy M$ fixed this issue as i was not looking forward to JTagin my system..
So thanks Microsoft for the fix!..

Also thank you Mr. Anonymous uploader for informing everyone that this update fixes the HDD issues!..
